title: Linux accton Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux accton command and learn how to manage network interface configuration, troubleshoot network issues, and more with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux accton Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux accton command and learn how to manage network interface configuration, troubleshoot network issues, and more with practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, accton, network configuration, network troubleshooting, network management, command-line tools

verify.name: Verify accton command status
verify.hint: The accton command should show that accounting is enabled. If it is not enabled, please enable it using the accton command.

steps.title: Manage Network Interface Configuration with accton

verify.name: Verify accton command for network configuration
verify.hint: The accton command should show that accounting is enabled, and the accounting log should contain the network configuration changes you made.

verify.name: Verify accton command for network troubleshooting
verify.hint: The accton command should show that accounting is enabled, and the accounting log should contain network-related processes after you simulate a network issue.
